description:
Growing a single open-source project can be more challenging than it seems. From deciding to build something from scratch, to promoting it and helping others use it — it all takes serious effort and perseverance. In this talk, I share my journey of developing AutoRAG, an open-source project that grew from 0 lines of code to 1.7k GitHub stars. If you're passionate about open source, this session is for you.

Dongkyu Kim
Lead developer of AutoRAG. Specializes in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) evaluation and optimization.

He is working to grow AutoRAG from the ground up into a global open-source project for automatic RAG optimization.

related_urls.label: From 0 Lines of Code to 1.7k GitHub Stars – PyCon Korea 2024

title: Open Source Project – From 0 Lines of Code to 1.7k GitHub Stars - Dongkyu Kim [PyCon Korea 2024]
